price: 13. iyo maxabbad Xaggayaga ah iyo daahir ahaansho, wuxuuna ahaa mid ka cabsada Alle oo ka dhowrsada xumaha.
arabic: وَحَنَانٗا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةٗۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waḥanānan min ladunnā wazakatan wakāna taqiyyan
